title: An optimal estimation approach in stratified random sampling utilizing two auxiliary attributes with application in agricultural, demography, finance, and education sectors
content:
Publication date: 15 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 17

Author(s): F.A. Almulhim, Kanwal Iqbal, Fathia M. Al Samman, Asad Ali, Mohammed M.A. Almazah
